Udemy's course on Web Development

08 Apr 2021

There are a bunch of free courses on Udemy. Here are some notes from the lectures. Iâ€™ll keep updating it.

Free code editors (both downloadable and online)

Script editor

  • Notepad++
  • Light table
  • Brackets
  • Atom
  • Sublime

HTML editor

  • Dreamweaver
  • Komodo

Online editor

  • Codepen.io
  • Javascript - jsfiddle.net
  • CSS editor - dabblet.com
  • Web editor - liveweave.com. Really good functionality.
  • Web design tool - Macaw
